text: ICYMI, WSIB staff walked out yesterday #onpoli #canlab

text: Here is a sampling of some bizarre and largely unreturned communications with the @OIC_CI_Canada. Is there anyone staffing this institution if so please send proof of life thanks and all the best
author: SaraMojtehedz

text:
A GTA college is taking away paid sick days "in compliance" with Ford's new labour legislation.

Except the legislation doesn't *require* employers to eliminate paid sick days. 

#onpoli #canlab #onlab
author: SaraMojtehedz

text: this is a very interesting set of graphs especially because of what the data says about the wages/precarity/workplace safety risks associated with jobs like home care, PSWs, etc.
author: SaraMojtehedz

text: During five months of striking and picketing in 2018 at #YorkU, she was allegedly subjected to “an overt pattern of sexual harassment” by the chairperson of her own union’s local unit #onlab #canlab #onpoli
author: SaraMojtehedz
